position_requirement: As a Legal/Commercial Counsel at Tencent you will be a key member of a small but growing team of in-house attorneys advising Tencent’s business and operations teams as they interact with American companies and enter into the American market. You will have a ground level opportunity to support the largest company in Asia in areas such as cloud computing, video games, and media entertainment. 1.Advise Tencent Cloud business, marketing, and operations teams on legal and business issues regarding Tencent Cloud’s international expansion and support of non-Chinese company’s use of Tencent Cloud within China. 2.Advise Tencent’s other business units and teams and US based teams, including Tencent Games, Tencent Pictures, and Tencent AI Lab, on general matters. 3.Negotiate, draft, and review licenses, intellectual property agreements, cloud service agreements, and general commercial agreements.Ensure compliance with US and international laws and regulations dealing with cloud computing, intellectual property, and data privacy and protection.4.Cooperate with other Tencent attorneys based in the USA and China.5.Manage outside counsel as required.
